purpose.value: A derived profile from [zib-NursingIntervention-event](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-NursingIntervention-event) to provide a version better suited for implementation purposes. This profile augments the base profile with elements found in the various use cases that have adopted the zib.

comment.value: As described on the root comment, the zib NursingIntervention can be used for performed singular interventions, planned/requested repeating interventions and series of interventions. The current profile describes performed singular interventions. If this intervention is the result of a previously planned/requested (series of) interventions, this relation can be described using a reference to a ServiceRequest conforming to profile [nl-core-NursingIntervention-request](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/nl-core-NursingIntervention-request).

Zib NursingIntervention defines a reference to zib MedicalDevice, which is modelled using a combination of the DeviceUseStatement and Device resources. In the context of zib NursingIntervention however, this reference is limited in scope to the materials used, which is just a subset of the entire zib MedicalDevice. In FHIR this aligns with the Device resource.
For this reason, the MedicalDevice concept in zib NursingIntervention is only implemented as a reference to the [nl-core-MedicalDevice.Product](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/nl-core-MedicalDevice.Product) profile on Device, referenced from the `Procedure.usedReference` element. This aligns with the intention of the zib.
See [ZIB-2691](https://nictiz.atlassian.net/browse/ZIB-2691) for details.
